<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="46513" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="46513" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.80</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="7270">7,270</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1055"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Fucking Fabulous</b> by <b>Tom Ford</b> is a Leather fragrance for women and men. <b>Fucking Fabulous</b> was launched in 2017. Top notes are Lavender and Clary Sage; middle notes are Leather, Bitter Almond, Vanilla and Orris; base notes are Leather, Tonka Bean, Cashmeran, White Woods and Amber. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Tom Ford presents a new limited edition called Fucking Fabulous from his exclusive Private Blend perfume line during the New York Fashion Week in September 2017.</p>
<p>Key ingredients of the composition include bitter almond oil, tonka bean, orris root, leather, cashmerean and clary sage oil.</p>
<p>Tom Ford Fucking Fabulous is available on September 7th at Tom Ford boutiques and on the official site as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color:                     Bougie interpretation of common oriental fragrances

                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Not groundbreaking or unique
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

                    Basic fragrance without anything special

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="46513"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 4.225rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98399898399848; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.164.jpg" style="width: 3.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Clary-Sage-164.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Clary Sage</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.156.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Leather-156.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Leather</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.130.jpg" style="width: 4.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Almond-130.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bitter Almond</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.87757293346737; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 3.175rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.101.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orris-Root-101.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Orris</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end;     <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/12997/news.12997-120x120.jpg" alt="clats dAmandes: Bitter and Sweet " style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">

        <p>by <i>Sergey Borisov</i></p>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2380708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2380708" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TyKueber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2358419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TyKueber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2380708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2380708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2358419">TyKueber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-12"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1734071904" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I thoroughly read through reviews of Tom Ford FF before purchasing an authentic sample and was hoping that the negative reviews were dramatic and inaccurate- but unfortunately they weren't. <br />
<br />
This fragrance is possibly the worst high end fragrance I have ever worn. I was in denial that this would actually smell like baby wipes but the many reviews suggesting so aren't far off. This fragrance is super powdery, musky, and I am getting no notes of leather, amber, cashmere or white oak. For reference (for heavier fragrances) I do like Givency Gentleman, John Varvatos Heritage, and D&amp;G The One and i do like Rose 31, Another 13 from Le Labo, LV Imagination on the ligher side. F*ucking Fabulous falls F*cking short- such a let down from this iconic fashion house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2380708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2380708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2378801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2378801" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AntonisCy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AntonisCy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2378801ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2378801" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764924">AntonisCy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-11"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733939517" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Parfum version coming out soon</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2378801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2378801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2377314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2377314" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ayregsh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ayregsh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2377314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2377314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757741">Ayregsh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-10">12/10/24 05:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to love this but I guess leather is not it for me. But all the cool celebrities wear it, or so they say, and the name is cool, but is too weird for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2377314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2377314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2376420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2375256" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="viez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1716159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="viez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2375256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2375256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716159">viez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-08">12/08/24 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The powdery lavender + almond combo is very pronounced in the opening. In the air there's definitely a resemblance to baby wipes, maybe nylon material, or even condoms... <br />
<br />
I do not gravitate towards this scent at all but I guess it deserves some credit for being unique. Overall it's pretty safe once it reaches the drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2375256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2375256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

<br />
what I get is a gorgeous fir tree style of fragrance for outdoors winter, feels very foresty and cold but still cozy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2362082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2362082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359480" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359480" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JuliaToothFairy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JuliaToothFairy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359480ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359480" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472">JuliaToothFairy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 02:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A complex, unique, bold, surprising perfume.<br />
Leather is my most hated note since I started my interest for perfumery. I always hate a fragrance that has leather listed, I just can't digest it. That is why, after reading the notes, I was sure Fucking Fabulous is definitely not for me.<br />
Surprise, surprise, I love it. <br />
Fucking Fabulous smells like lavender, a little bit of vanilla, a little bit of delicate pepper, and a lot of the most delicate, nostalgic, smooth leather.<br />
I wore this perfume three times. Every time, as soon as I smelled it, I got flashbacks of my trip to Skiathos Island. I don't know why. Maybe it smells like the old hotel that I stayed in, or the old bus seats, or maybe the people smells like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2359480"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2359480#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349795" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349795" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="primadoll"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992543"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1992543.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="primadoll" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349795ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349795" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992543">primadoll</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 06:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its very similar to She by Armani, except I get a punchy fruity note in this somehow. Smells ok. The lavender and sage together makes this smell very piney. Pretty unremarkable and other releases such as plum japonais completely mogs this one. It does smell good, but in a soap way, a cheap soap you got because its marketed as a nice hand soap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2349795"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2349795#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347916" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MalibuMermaid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757701.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MalibuMermaid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347916ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347916" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757701">MalibuMermaid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 14:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first Tom Ford trial I have a sample vial. Nauseating, baby wipes, leather, its too strong. Im a woman and dont find this unisex- suitable for a man, but please dont wear it around me. I love so many designer fragrances and had put off trying Tom Ford due to its priceWith all the Tom Ford hype I was surprised how bad this is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2347916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2347916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346913" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346913" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChefTorpedo33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2136726"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChefTorpedo33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346913ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346913" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2136726">ChefTorpedo33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 17:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay yeah this does kinda smell like baby wipes/wet wipes  Not in a bad way though, just very clean. Smells nice, but also boringly genericin no way worth the price. Way better designers and niches with this fragrance profile for much less, youre just paying more because it says Tom Ford. Should be called Freaking Not Bad</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2346913"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2346913#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334643" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rawrgers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252440"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2252440.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rawrgers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels&#039; Share"title="Angels&#039; Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252440">rawrgers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-01">11/01/24 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Doesnt match the name, imo. Quite boring, typically masculine, a bit of a 3-in-1 shower gel vibe here. A little bit of woodiness somewhere in the background, but its just too neutral to be called fabulous. Meh. Expected way more from this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2334643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2334643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2330391" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330391" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mschnabel666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/573132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.573132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mschnabel666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Smoking-Hot-84413.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84413.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Smoking Hot"title="Smoking Hot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330391ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330391" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/573132">mschnabel666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ohhhh, blind buy because a favorite authentic re-seller on ebay had gift sets for $150! (50ml plus 10ml refillable pen) I am obsessed with Ombre Leather, and dying to smell Eau D'Ombre. But in the meantime, I got this. (Sorry everyone, they sold out fast, about 20 of them)<br />
<br />
New shoes and powdery baby wipes. LMAO. Rubbery shoes, not entirely leather.<br />
I prob would not have bought this if I had sniffed before, but a deal is a deal, and I do like it. It's weird. It's Tom Ford.<br />
Dries does to soft powder suede woods. It's safe and wearable due to low sillage (good lasting). It's not masculine, but it's not perfume-y like a woman's perfume. I look forward to spending more time with it.<br />
<br />
Omg, I get the joke now. Condoms and baby wipes. But make it fashion.<br />
<br />
Edit-- I wore this to work today, two sprays on my skin/chest above my bra. Let dry and dress. I have EXCELLENT personal sillage, it follows me everywhere but no one notices it. This is so comforting to me, it's just powdery woody creamy leather/suede... peaceful smooth zen. Not really a perfume- more like a feeling-smell! Haha! It's still weird tho. Just as a whole-- it's quite pleasing, almost ordinary? Sounds contradictory but its all those things. And def addictive. Not my fave TF, but possibly the most fun to wear.<br />
Up close, huffing my sweater fabric, I still get designer condoms. LMAO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2330391"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2330391#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321164" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="airfra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2277251"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2277251.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="airfra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-1826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood"title="Oud Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2277251">airfra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 15:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>tried it in store, first 10 minutes it smelled like sage and almonds, after those 10 minutes it started to smell like used bandaids, which i cant stand.<br />
in the final drydown it kept the bandaids smell with a burnt tyre smell in the background.<br />
the price is absurd, 350 for 50ml in italy.<br />
it lasted around 6-7 hours on my skin (as a skin scent after 30 minutes).<br />
<br />
at the end of the day though i kept smelling my wrist because it is very unique and addicting, wouldnt buy tho.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2321164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2321164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318749" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sweetymasculine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1697858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sweetymasculine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318749ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318749" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697858">sweetymasculine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 09:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really wanted to like this as it was hyped up a lot, but man this is just such a letdown. I barely smell the leather, to me this reminds me of those tissues they have in a diaper changing room. <br />
<br />
Also... the price is a joke. I have no issue paying 150-200 for a 50ml bottle, as long as the scent is incredible (like most Private blend fragrances.) But 250? At a discounter? This is just absurdity and has nothing to do with the luxury offering Tom Ford used to have.<br />
<br />
If this was released by a brand with less recognition, nobody would talk about this (and this is coming from a big Tom Ford fan). Bottle looks awesome, unfortunately it doesn't do the name justice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2318749"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2318749#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309661" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309661" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GUomo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205893"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2205893.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GUomo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Intense-Oud-32743.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32743.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Oud"title="Intense Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309661ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309661" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205893">GUomo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 01:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At the opening it is very aromatic like writen. After 5 minutes almond, smooth leather and orris came in. Almond heavy, can't smell vanilla actually. Good scent overall.<br />
<br />
Scent: 7/10<br />
Longetivity: 7/10<br />
Sillage: 6/10<br />
Mass Appeal: 7/10<br />
Compliments: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2309661"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2309661#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308516" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trendkill97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094278"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1094278.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trendkill97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Black-Aoud-1142.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1142.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Aoud"title="Black Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094278">Trendkill97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 00:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really well done dirty leather suede and bitter almond dominant scent, that keeps you wanting to smell yourself more and more when sprayed on. Raunchy scent. The lavender background, touches of fluffy vanilla, cashmeran, clary sage holding everything together make it a nice cozy, comforting, dark aromatic scent. Which is still delicate not dense. Subtle sweetness, a bit crunchy even, somehow reminiscent of leather seat covers. This also reminds me in its feel a bit of Tom of Finland by ELDO and BDK's Creme de Cuir. Definitely a unique take. In the top 5 Tom Fords for me for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2308516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2308516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Id say mass appealing as well, I know many who like this fragrance.<br />
If you were to walk in a room everyone would think youre a sexy wealthy gentleman. It does smell interesting and I keep sniffing my arm where I sprayed it but at the same I'm getting some burnt rubber smell. <br />
Performance is great but I'm not sure if many people around will enjoy the smell, it can get really overwhelming. <br />
<br />
Overall I think it's extremely overpriced and at this price range you can get a really nice niche fragrance instead of TF. <br />
Definitely sample before you buy, even if you're a big fan of TF.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2302221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2302221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Hey Tom Ford, you do you</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2299069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2299069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I wasnt sure what to expect with a name like F-ing Fabulous.<br />
<br />
I was expecting a scent to drive me crazy and be FUCKING FABULOUS!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2293335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2293335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289532" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289532" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tallamericano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tallamericano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289532ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289532" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412562">tallamericano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Top notes to me are leather and vanilla/ some other sweet gourmand note. Dry down was almonds mixed with baby wipes? A bizarre fragrancr to me, its going so many directions so quickly that I cant decipher what its trying to be or what its trying to smell like. Cold and plasticky one minute, high end hotel body lotion another minute, and then I can hints of anise/ licorice followed by baby powder. Opening was loud like black orchid minus the chocolate. I really dont know what to make of this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2289532"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2289532#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286039" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jaelzion"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1945282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jaelzion" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286039ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286039" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945282">Jaelzion</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 12:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford Fucking Fabulous is a fragrance that manages to blend smoothness with a subtly masculine edge. It opens with a hint of pine and a clean, lotion-like quality that gives it a polished, refreshing feel. The leather note adds a sophisticated depth, while sage and lavender introduce a herbal, slightly aromatic touch.<br />
<br />
The orris and cashmeran contribute to a soft, velvety texture, balancing out the strong leather and creating a refined, creamy background. Vanilla adds a touch of sweetness, but its restrained, ensuring the overall scent remains elegant and not overly sweet. Its a distinctive fragrance that strikes a nice balance between smoothness and a hint of ruggedness, making it versatile for various occasions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2286039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2286039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274331" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cowgirllikeme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139830"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2139830.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cowgirllikeme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139830">cowgirllikeme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 01:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Doesnt smell nice on everybody but on me I adore it. Its perfectly wearable and weird. It has this cold plasticky scent that just has me addicted! Maybe its the lavender and sage. To me the leather is quite hidden but acts as a wonderful base to the synthetic weirdness on top. Its more like how a leather jacket smells when its freezing outside. I dont know I just love it. Its just so expensive</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2274331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2274331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273706" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="semyonsemyoff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2087624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="semyonsemyoff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled"title="Boss Bottled"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273706ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273706" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624">semyonsemyoff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 09:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#recherche - I agree. It's a funny way to put it.<br />
<br />
Never had experience with leather fragrances before Tuscan Leather, and I found F. Fab to be somewhat in the same realm. I guess they made this leather note very similar. I also have a decant of Ombre Leather and it also kind of goes in the same direction, you can kind of pick out similarities. <br />
Despite the apparent consensus of the Fragrantica forum, I actually like it a bit better than Tuscan Leather at least. TL was more earthy and, as my wife said smells like dunk. TL is heavier and stronger, this one is tuned down.<br />
<br />
As for the smell. This time it's not dunk, not dark, it's mysterious, its kind of fruity in a weird way. As if someone put a plate of frozen spicy fruit salad that has been defrosted and frozen 10 times on top of a standard mens fougere (like Azzaro Chrome) and added something that vaguely reminds of a leather jacket. This smell is in a way playful, but at the same time annoying, because you cant make heads or tails of it and still have to acknowledge that its there for at least 2-3 hours. Then it becomes less noticeable and OK. Despite this critical remark, I could say that its just more pleasing and easy-going than TL. To put it in other words  you can blind-buy it more easily.<br />
<br />
I think its a all-year-round, day and night, but more night. <br />
Powdery and creamy? Well, maybe. Hence the unidentifiable nature of this fruit salad made into a creamy gooey thing that magically transformed into lavender. Its smooth, yes.<br />
Overhyped? You bet. The problem is, I dont think this scent is memorable, because its unclear, and I dont think it will draw compliments. Can it give a headache? To some people  I can see that.<br />
The most awful thing about this aroma-effort is the pretentious name. Its the most far away thing from being fabulous. Perhaps its fabulous in the way that obnoxious people found themselves fabulous, but everyone thinks they are pathetic. <br />
And its definitely not f.cking (I now, we have a child). I heard someone say it smelled like condoms. And I was so excited to smell lube and vinyl from the rubbers, but the interest was lost quickly. It smells nothing like condoms. I may have a child, but I know what they smell like.<br />
Overpriced per usual with Tom Ford.<br />
<br />
OK longevity. Strong for 2-3 hours then it's a bit more than a skin scent for 6-8 hours. Problems with sillage.<br />
<br />
And yes, it's more male. Can't imagine it on a woman.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2273706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2273706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272254" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2272254" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrAbbas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096131"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1096131.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrAbbas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2272254ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2272254" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096131">MrAbbas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 05:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Leather scent that is harsh in the begining but give it 15 minutes, it opens up to a more aromatic smooth crisp scent that is somehow fresh and a bit astringent. Very sexy on a well dressed man who is doing well in life. With the wrong outfit, this wont work. I actually like it and I find the name catchy but yes, way over priced. I do get the Ombre leather comparison somehow but they also differ. Versatile in my opinion and performs well. I find it sexy but the price, come on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2272254"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2272254#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The middle notes listed here are consistent with what I am picking up with a hint of lavender mixed in.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2266217"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2266217#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690344">StunningSamuel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 13:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It took me a few days to get used to this one. I'm not exactly the biggest fan of leather, but I can say that this fragrance helped me warm up to it. It starts off aromatic with lavender, sharpened by sage. It dries down to a scent reminiscent of vanilla ice cream, but the leather note comes out of left field, adding a lot of personality and body. While I dont think its worth its price tag, its definitely a fragrance worth experiencing, especially if youre new to almond or leather. 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I only wear this outdoors on chilly nights.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2265013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2265013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261488" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260206" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RifleZz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992810"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1992810.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RifleZz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oajan"title="Oajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992810">RifleZz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 01:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is Ombr Leather V2.<br />
I love both of them.<br />
This one is more complex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2260206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2260206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260165" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sandyknows"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201261"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2201261.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sandyknows" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Ombre-Leather-2018-50239.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50239.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombr Leather (2018)"title="Ombr Leather (2018)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260165ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260165" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201261">Sandyknows</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 00:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This gets rated abrasively. I prefer this to ombr leather and I own and like ombr leather a lot. This just adds a more aromatic opening and sweeter touch which I think makes it more everyday where able and less occasion specific. Still, this fragrance is completely sexy and powerful. Another banger from Tom ford.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2260165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2260165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258297" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258297" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jackonium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1483700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jackonium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragrance-World/Apex-99732.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99732.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Apex"title="Apex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258297ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258297" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);
