My goodness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2258297"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2258297#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258250" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Buster Keaton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665831"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1665831.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Buster Keaton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258250ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258250" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2258250"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2258250#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255303" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cinema Paradiso"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cinema Paradiso" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Eau-Givree-72439.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72439.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d&#039;Hermes Eau Givree"title="Terre d&#039;Hermes Eau Givree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459827">Cinema Paradiso</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For a while ive worn my watch on a canvas strap. Yesterday i sprayed FF on my wrist. I didn't like it. Its dry and sour. That, in itself isn't an issue. The smell on day one resembled medicinal tablet that you chewed on instead of swallowing- aspirin maybe.<br />
However the same wrist that I sprayed it on had my watch on and the canvas strap held the smell still on next day7. Who would have guessed that the FF turned canvas to smell like a leather strap next day? Nice, very authentic worn off leather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2255303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2255303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249523" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249523" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chrisandra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317797"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chrisandra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249523ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249523" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317797">Chrisandra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 16:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Um hello are there any admins monitoring the language used in the reviews?<br />
This A-Minor individual really needs to get immediate help and get out of here ASAP. <br />
And now about the perfume. <br />
A strange but interesting scent. I got a sample and was surprised by it but not convinced enough to buy a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2249523"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2249523#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249107" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eva745"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408173"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408173.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eva745" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juicy-Couture/Rah-Rah-Rouge-46584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rah Rah Rouge"title="Rah Rah Rouge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249107ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249107" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408173">eva745</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 11:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's insane to me that people think this smell creamy and sweet. I hadn't even realized this had gone viral and I came today here to leave my little review after a few years of testing this and found all these polarazing reviews haha I just love the perfume world it's pure illusion.<br />
<br />
Anyway, this smells like celery to me. And I like this fragrance, it was actually the fragrance selected to bless my first day on my new job at the brand after being obsessed with it for years. And in all these years my opinion on this particular composition has changed a lot, but to be fair I still perceive the same things I perceived the first time I tested it (though then I hated it and thought it didn't smell anything like its name). This is a difficult composition I'll give you that, it is NOT a safe blind buy, it is NOT for everyone, it is NOT what you would expect from a fragrance if you are pretty new to private blends or to the fragrance world in general. But it IS an acquired taste and it is one that you come to really appreciate if you give it time and space to evolve on you.<br />
<br />
This (to me) feels very very green and it's like a bitter green, that's why I haven't been able to shake that 'celery' impression (must be the sage). It is not aquatic green or floral green or woodsy green or a lot of other 'greens' that I can think of. To me it's the celery of a very very expensive designer Bloody Mary on a club that you can't afford and that probably costs 35$ and doesn't even have tomato juice but some weird new age transparent vodka reduction with a molecule of whatever. It feels like ABSURD rich, you know? Like the kids in Succession. They don't have a clue but they have the money. I guess that's what I mean with an acquired taste because I also couldn't stand the characters in Succession at first because they are obnoxious and rude and plain stupid but you then get to know them more and you realize that they just operate on a whole different world where things like that are actually irrelevant because they may not know how to express their feelings but they know how to play billion dollar poker with their companies. Anyway I know I'm probably not making sense but what I mean is that for me Fucking Fabulous is a window to a world that I definitely can't relate to but that it is there, and it may be absurd but is luxurious, and it is real.<br />
<br />
And I guess that's why I picked it today to wear it because honestly me working at this brand (it's only a replacement for a month) is also quite absurd but it makes me incredibly happy anyway. If you are not rich this is a fragrance that works for me as a kind of inside joke, but art has its layers and since this fragance can have meaning, it is a good fragrance for me. Also yeah, at this point I really think it does smell fucking fabulous.<br />
<br />
EDIT: I just found this blog post from 2017 when this fragrance was released that heavily critizices it, and I'll quote from it something that I think illustrates part of what I said (the blog is called kafkaesqueblog.com):<br />
<br />
"At least Coveteur is honest enough to acknowledge that the actual scent bouquet is the single most irrelevant part of Fucking Fabulous. As they put it:<br />
<br />
With a label like this, its not really about the juice, but bottle-bragging rights.<br />
<br />
Bragging rights are just the tip of the iceberg; the massive body below the water is all about money, Instagram influencers, money, coolness, money, titillation, money, and schoolboy/girl giggles over the naughty name  oooh, can you imagine! they whisper behind their hands, how fucking fabulous!"<br />
<br />
Yes, exactly this. It is a fragrance that smells of MONEY and nothing else behind it, not even a brain. It's kind of a statement. It's a happening.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2249107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2249107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245378" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245378" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PhantomBelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2029931.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PhantomBelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Born-in-Roma-the-Gold-Donna-95704.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95704.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Born in Roma the Gold Donna"title="Born in Roma the Gold Donna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245378ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245378" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931">PhantomBelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin I get mostly the almond and very soft leather, next would be the lavender and sage, and somewhere in the background is the amber, orris root and woods. The entire blend is really unique in my collection as powdery scents usually don't last on me.  The projection is low, but the lasting power is pretty good, 5+ hours for me. <br />
<br />
Good for work and a casual scent, not in your face. 10/10 unisex. Also could be a layering scent with some of the others in the line, maybe a citrus, vanilla or incense would go well with it...I will be experimenting. <br />
Purchased from: MicroPerfumes &amp; Ebay</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2245378"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2245378#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244557" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MonSieurrrr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452648"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MonSieurrrr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452648">MonSieurrrr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 00:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smooth and gorgeous blend of leather, vanilla, lavender, almond and tiny reference to note of rubber, overall it smells as written on the bottle)<br />
just ignore a bunch of idiots with baby wipes nonsense))</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2244557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2244557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243263" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ricky1357"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631698"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1631698.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ricky1357" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243263ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243263" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631698">Ricky1357</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 19:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like Dior sauvage and Ferragamo's F black had a baby and the final product smells like the baby's butt wipes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It has no character.<br />
<br />
I used a few sprays, and got almost no projection. It felt like a skin scent right from the start.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2242132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2242132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells of almond butter baby wipes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2240720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2240720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239954" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vintages"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349262"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1349262.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vintages" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Layton-39314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Layton"title="Layton"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349262">vintages</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 16:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect. This is the leather fragrance I was looking for: smooth, understated, seductive, with a tiny hint of sweetness. It's a beautiful DNA, irresistible. None of the notes stand out, which means it's a single final accord without sharp edges.  It's so unobtrusive that I even use it at work in the office.<br />
<br />
The leather is similar to the leather in Tuscan Leather. But unlike TL, the leather is only a fraction of the final accord. I don't like wearing TL because I don't want to smell like a new pair of leather boots, but I love FF because it smells fantastic.<br />
It's perfect for men. one woman said, it smells like men. Whatever she meant by that.<br />
<br />
But it's also perfect for women.<br />
A colleague of mine smelled it on me and immediately fell in love with the scent. She decided to buy it for herself immediately, despite the high price. She said: Yolo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2239954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2239954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lavender isn't dominating in this<br />
Absolutely not for women</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2229117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2229117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225618" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tshahb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579649"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1579649.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tshahb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Afrika-Olifant-30589.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30589.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Afrika Olifant"title="Afrika Olifant"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225618ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225618" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579649">Tshahb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 19:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lavender-filled condoms.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2225618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2225618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220253" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="7seven7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="7seven7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962398">7seven7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 10:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a rubber top water frog</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2220253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2220253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219923" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Janini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1899909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1899909.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Janini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Millesime-Jasmin-97101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Millsime Jasmin"title="Shalimar Millsime Jasmin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1899909">Janini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 02:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Turn out this one becomes my most favorite Tom Ford fragrances in my collection. I like the way this perfume smell on my skin. I got soft leathery, creamy and bittersweet that very sexy and addictive. It smells cozy like a new leather couch or a new leather car seat. Longevity is amazing. I get 12 hours plus and can get a whiff of my perfume here and there after that. It keeps linear consistently. It's there when you need to smell it, does not keeps disappearing or playing hide and seek like Another 13 or BR 540. This perfume is so beautiful, not too loud , very polite and stay very close to my skin that meant only for me to enjoy its beauty. It's not a compliment getter. If you're looking for crowd pleaser, look somewhere else. This one is more for the introverted and If any perfume made for Aquarians, FF would be the one !. I don't have a signature scent but if I still have a strong love for FF for the next 6 months, this one could possibly be my signature scent. We shall see.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2219923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2219923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217573" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RGH01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1331188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RGH01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/The-Dark-Side-40884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Dark Side"title="The Dark Side"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188">RGH01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont have a lot of love or respect for the house of Tom Ford, but Fucking Fabulous is the exception. This is definitely a love it or hate it fragrance - as for me, I certainly adore it. I am already a keen enthusiast of leather perfumes and whilst this is completely different from my usual style, there is something about it I cant resist. <br />
<br />
The leather is smooth, rich and surprisingly subtle - nothing loud or garish like that of Ombre or Tuscan Leather. There is an aromatic facet of lavender and sage, however I feel this is only fleeting, laying down the stepping stones towards a warmer, sweeter heart. Alongside the leather, a dry and bitter almond note makes itself known which is very reminiscent of ground almonds, softened by the creamy sweetness of vanilla, orris and coumarin.<br />
<br />
I love it, everything about it. Admittedly, its not the best fragrance ever made nor is it worth the ridiculous price tag. But, if it can be found at the right price, I would jump on it; this fragrance is incredibly unique and once youve smelled it, you cannot forget it. The true gem from Tom Ford in my eyes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2217573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2217573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214246" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214246" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheTrackEnthusiast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2054081.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheTrackEnthusiast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214246ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214246" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054081">TheTrackEnthusiast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells fucknig fabulous, only issue is the price. Got a dupe from Dossier and its great !!  I wouldnt call this a leather scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2214246"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2214246#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214229" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SiddhantSuryawanshi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1690312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SiddhantSuryawanshi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214229ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214229" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690312">SiddhantSuryawanshi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 10:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>They call this a "Leather" fragrance, but what it really smells like is burnt rubber and lavender, a confused blend of clashing notes.<br />
<br />
Instead of a fresh, aromatic opening, it feels like someone spilled a bottle of cheap essential oil in a musty old drawer. Its as if they couldnt decide on a theme, so they threw in everything but the kitchen sink. The result is a bizarre, medicinal scent thats neither here nor there.<br />
<br />
I expected a better dry down given the interesting base notes. What should be a rich, comforting dry down ends up being an overbearing mess that clings to your skin like an unwanted house guest.<br />
<br />
The only reason I still have this disaster in a bottle is because it was a birthday gift from an office colleague. And Im pretty sure even she doesnt like it. I mean, who gifts something labeled Fucking Fabulous with a straight face? Its almost as if she was trolling me. Tom Ford might think this fragrance is the epitome of luxury, but to me, its just a high-priced joke that fell flat.<br />
<br />
Save your money and your nose; steer clear of this so-called fragrance masterpiece. Its anything but fabulous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2214229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2214229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210774" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2210774" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xoxoMyke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/782944"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.782944.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xoxoMyke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2210774ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2210774" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/782944">xoxoMyke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon sampling at Ulta, this reminded me of a leather focused and minimal sweetness Body Kouros / Bvlgari Black.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2210774"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2210774#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2210747" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mxbvshv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2076309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mxbvshv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Le-Gemme-Orom-72618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Gemme Orom"title="Le Gemme Orom"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2210747ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2210747" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076309">mxbvshv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing opening, but after some time it turns into detergent smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2210747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2210747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2198243"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2198243#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194422" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Om3r_perfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2140989.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Om3r_perfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Imaginary-Authors/Slow-Explosions-40420.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40420.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Slow Explosions"title="Slow Explosions"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194422ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194422" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140989">Om3r_perfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really love the start of this fragrance, it comes off with a more fresh lavender opening but then nicely dries down to this amber, vanilla and leather scent. It reminds me of grand soir but with leather. Its a great formal type of scent due to its leather note but its sweetness from the amber makes it a more wearable and less harsh leather scent. <br />
<br />
Its a good winter and fall fragrance. It has great longevity of 10-11 hours. The scent projects about arms length away.<br />
<br />
Honestly Tom fords are just overpriced, and thats the same case here. The 50ml goes for I think 300 USD. Its just an insane price point when there are soo many better fragrances. To be honest I rather wear grand soir from MFK which is at a lower price and has maybe the best amber scent in the market. And if you want a more wearable leather scent I would advise to check out Van Cleef and Arpels line or even ombr leather. Although the price is quiet high I do think this is one of the best Tom fords, the amber leather combination is amazing but at this price point you can go for Memo which has the best leather scents by far in the fragrance market.<br />
<br />
Scent: 9<br />
Longevity: 9<br />
Projection: 7<br />
Value: 3<br />
Overall: 8</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2194422"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2194422#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194247" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentfiend80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentfiend80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194247ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194247" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171906">scentfiend80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 10:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Fords FF kind of blew me away and is one of the perfumes that opened the door to me exploring this rich world of fragrance. All of the components of this fragrance smell high quality especially the Clary Sage and leather. What I find most appealing about it is it has this note of brand new carpet that I cant get enough of when Im wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2194247"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2194247#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193673" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mamaboocee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701416"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mamaboocee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Lady-Vengeance-1715.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1715.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lady Vengeance"title="Lady Vengeance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701416">Mamaboocee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 20:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I SO wanted to love this!  I mean - the name alone suckered me in. <br />
<br />
I don't mean to bash this fragrance.  Some people love it. And it truly smells lovely on them!  And then there's me.<br />
<br />
I have always loved every TF fragrance I tried -  White Patchoulli, Velvet Orchid and Black Orchid to name a few.  I had just purchased Rose Prick and Lost Cherry at the counter at Nordstom.  I absolutely loved those!  <br />
<br />
So I tested FF and said okay, I'll take a bottle of that, too!  The test strip smelled beautiful and interesting, so I spritzed some on my wrist! And still loving it, i bought a bottle and went on my happy way. <br />
Hours later something wasn't right.  <br />
What's that stink? <br />
It's MY WRIST??  Yes. It was. And it wasn't fabulous.<br />
No, Tom, no! <br />
A whole week went by of me begging the bottle to STAY smelling like what I tested in the store.  A whole week of me getting mad because it would not comply.  <br />
<br />
So that week spent at home with FF went like this:  After i detected the bad smell coming from my wrist, i scrubbed it off.  <br />
I showered completely and tried to start from square one. Nope, it turned on me and turned faster every time I tested a spritz.  I was very ginger with the spritzing - like the way you just try a fragrance in the store - so you don't want to have to scrub at the mall just in case its bad.  <br />
Nope.  Still stinks. But quicker each time.  Was there an expiration on the good part of that fragrance?<br />
I tried a bit of a bolder spritz - that just made things worse.  Fucking stoooopid.<br />
The worst was thinking I scrubbed it all off but when it got a little warm at work, I got a visit from Fucking scrubber Fabulous.  And a migraine.  I couldn't wait to go home and shower and then march into Norsdtrom demanding to demand a refund. <br />
Thank goodness Nordstom has a liberal return policy!  And understanding sales associated. (Wait - did they KNOW?)<br />
I tried Norstom's tester again. It just smelled as awful as it did at home!! It LIED to me that first day like a bad date!   <br />
Why did this turn out to be a scrubber for me?  It started out great and ended up STALKING me. After a while It gave me a headache after i simply glanced at that bottle. <br />
 When people say they got migraines from the urinal cake smell of this, I get it.  <br />
<br />
In the old days before Uber, i once got stuck staying at the house of an acquaintance.  My designated driver bailed on me, so I had NO choice but to sleep on the couch of a guy I knew - but apparently, I did not know him THAT well. <br />
Certainly not well enough to know that he stored blankets in the same closet as naked urinal cakes. <br />
He threw me a blanket as i retired to the couch - a blanket that he swore was clean - but it must have been stored in that closet. Directly on the urinal cakes. Why he has unwrapped urinal cakes in his closet - is beyond me. <br />
As long as it was urinal cakes and not URINE, I thought, okay.  <br />
But the stank of urinal cakes got me so bad that night, that to this day, just thinking of that smell makes me gag.  I couldn't get home fast enough to burn my clothes and clorox my exposed skin.<br />
Fast forward to the week of my FF purchase to ask the question: "Why did FF sneak up behind me and shout "SURPRISE! URINAL CAKES!" like this?"  <br />
Did that fucking perfume know about the urinal cake blanket debacle of "1990 something"?  <br />
No warning, no little tiny hint of urinal cakes - before POW!  The big blast of URINAL CAKES in my personal space when it was supposed to smell fucking - - - fabulous!<br />
And to think i went back, and tried Fucking Fabulous again and again!  Fucking Fabulously stupid!<br />
<br />
I really really wanted to like it.  I think this one is either getting along with you fabulously, or it's a huge fucking miss.  Fucking Fabulous. <br />
<br />
Do you think they'll get around to naming a fragrance "Sneaky Urinal Cakes"?  <br />
I might try it. On a test paper. Or maybe not.<br />
<br />
RIP Joey "Urinal cakes".</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2193673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2193673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188241" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188241" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937">Chesf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 13:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When hair salon meets salty musk.  <br />
Its not the usual feel-good scent, but its just so odd, intriguing and unique. <br />
Eccentric, theres a crayon like smell to it, I guess its the almond.<br />
Its formal but playful, lame but approachable/charming, smartass but not off-putting. <br />
Full of personality, unapologetically funny, unpretentious, not as austere/deep/mysterious as other leather perfume.<br />
<br />
Mmm Id love to smell this on a man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2188241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2188241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185742" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MayKlein"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MayKlein" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185742ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185742" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163758">MayKlein</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 05:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tem uma tima projeo, mas no fixa. Os perfumes da Tom Ford na minha pele tem uma pssima fixao, j se vc for do sexo masculino, a fixao  10/10. Sinto muita madeira e incenso nele, um cheiro hipnotizante, delicioso mas s recomendo pro sexo masculino. E no compre antes de testar, ele pode dar enxaqueca.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2185742"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2185742#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185551" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040463">Pick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 23:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm never one to hate on basic scents, I'm the biggest sauvage fan you'll ever meet. But this is so basic for a ridiculous price, it's just basic aromatics and then some leather in the background. The leather is very strong and pronounced and it definitely makes this cologne stand out but it's just not worth the price. I'd say something like ysl Y would be better for a fraction of the price, the only thing this cologne has going for it is how high quality the leather is.<br />
<br />
Also I'm starting to see a trend where people are calling any non citrus aquatic cologne a winter and fall only cologne. There is nothing sweet or spicy about this cologne, I could wear it in the summer with no problem</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2185551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2185551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2183985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178536" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bebelusica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259573"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259573.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bebelusica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Golden-Sand-20101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Golden Sand"title="Golden Sand"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178536ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178536" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259573">Bebelusica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 04:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The price blew my mind. I got this as a present from my mother. That price is unjustifiable to me for this certain perfume, when there are countless of arabic perfumes that smell similar and cost WAY less AND perform even better than this.<br />
<br />
Anyway, this smells very oriental, very much like an arabic perfume. More on the powdery side, though. The lasting power is ok, maybe it just doesn't last super long on my skin.<br />
<br />
This perfectly encapsulates what an unisex perfume should be, in my opinion. This fragrance truly has no gender, when you smell it it's like you're smelling the androgynous Hermaphroditus. It might lean more masculine, though, to some.<br />
<br />
I like it anyway, I'm an arabic perfume lover and an avid fan of any oriental leaning smells so this is a win in my book.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2178536"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2178536#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The kind of scent you dont easily forget.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2170939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2170939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167999" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167999" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JasKiew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1611442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JasKiew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Perris-Monte-Carlo/Patchouli-Nosy-Be-28345.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28345.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Patchouli Nosy Be"title="Patchouli Nosy Be"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167999ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167999" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442">JasKiew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 21:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Isn't cheap. Got me a 50ml because the Maison Alhambra dupe smells so good and lasted days on tees. While initial sprays on immediate opening I thought projection was weak, slowly it opens up as I wore it after a while, takes a slight while to react with the skin chemistry. It doesn't seem as aromatic as the dupe but good enough...it's got that leather with almond and vanilla that I feel is prominent and dominantly staying there mostly weather on skin or tees...maybe not for everyone and only some will prefer the vibe and dna of TFFF. There's a few other frags that has the vibe of this but they have fig and are sweeter. I'll take it as a collection and wear it once a while because it's not cheap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2167999"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2167999#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
