And its a scent that i would call sexy and assertive</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2153441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2153441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2149811" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brandawg_kessel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1511840"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1511840.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brandawg_kessel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carlisle"title="Carlisle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2149811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2149811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1511840">brandawg_kessel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A mix of vanilla and leather that makes your mouth water.<br />
Tom Ford F#'ing Fabulous is fantastic. It feels like an enhanced Ombre Leather. My only issue is that it transfers to skin very quickly. When getting down to it, this fragrance can do it all. It's sexy, makes you drool, and smells sincerely fantastic. It's mature and youthful all at once. The opening is brash but the dry down is beautiful.<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Projection: 5/10<br />
Versatility: 7/10<br />
For: Dates in the winter, going out at night, something fancy<br />
Overall: 8.6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2149811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2149811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145821" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Odor Aeternitatis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816990"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1816990.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Odor Aeternitatis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816990">Odor Aeternitatis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 15:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent is very unique and has the signature of Tom Ford. I love tonka, leather, and almond notes but this one is not my cup of tea. It's not a fragrance that you can wear every day, but it's perfect for special occasions and specific dress codes. It's very bitter and besides the leather the Orris note is very dominant.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2145821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2145821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2139095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2139095" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jaywizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2095800"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2095800.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jaywizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2139095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2139095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2095800">jaywizard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-28">04/28/24 11:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Having blind bought a full bottle of ombre leather just before trying this scent, to me, this just seems like a less herbal, sweeter version of that fragrance. The leather takes a backseat to nice lavender and vanilla, soothing warmness... no overwhelming jasmine. It also smells a bit like my fresh laundry to me, reminds me of stepping out of the shower and putting on warm linens before bed. I enjoy it quite a bit, but I'd never put this into my regular scent rotation or make it a signature in any sense, simply due to the ridiculous price tag. Certainly nice to have as a travel size for special occasions, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2139095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2139095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137947" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vorachoom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466524"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vorachoom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466524">vorachoom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The most luxury shoe shine wax with sweetness and floral touch.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It's leather and cough syrup. It's not terrible, but it's also not effing fabulous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2137530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2137530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258987">gg23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 08:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very underrated fragrance imo. I mean, yes, outrageous price just like any TF, but the scent itself is artistic and beautiful. Beautiful lavender, tonka and vanilla mix with a bit of leather in the background. It's a dark lavender scent. I love it. Great for any season and occasion but I think it fits well for evening events. There is a mysterious, sexy and addictive quality to it and you just want to keep sniffing it. 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2133744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2133744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Longevity: 5/10<br />
Performance: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2131606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2131606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125999" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="netosan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1377279.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="netosan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125999ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125999" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377279">netosan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 21:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While not a fan of Tom Fords private blend collection, this one is freaking fabulous. 100% masculine but without the smokiness and the awful syntethic smells found in leather scents. Lavender and Orris make it so wearable and enjoyable. Even the candle is f fabulous. The price is extremely steep and it does not justify that is more expensive than a bond or creed. But you wont smell like anyone as it really depends on your chemistry. Quite elegant and quite refreshing :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2125999"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2125999#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124565" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124565" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jeshuwin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2094157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jeshuwin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124565ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124565" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); <br />
It's a very interesting blend of almond, vanilla, leather, sort of powdery/waxy. But it is more on the masculine side of things. This is an attention grabber for sure, lots of compliments. <br />
<br />
Many love it but many hate it. If you can rock it- go ahead</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2124565"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2124565#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124251" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shohruhnorqulov08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1956778"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1956778.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shohruhnorqulov08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1956778">shohruhnorqulov08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smell nothing but powdered bitter almonds. It's not for me.<br />
5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2124251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2124251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Aromatic, slightly bitter leather! No, this doesnt smell like cocaine, I dont know what idiot started that rumor. I was a wild child in my 20s I know what blow tastes an smells like. I was hoping for more coumarin. Sort of disappointed. Glad I got an inexpensive 10 Ml.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2119939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2119939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; You have to smell it to make a judgment about it. I personally am not loving it but I dont hate it. Its unique Ill give it that but not necessarily in a good way for me. Would I shell out that much money for it NO! Ill buy velvet orchid instead. I got it practically free so it will be my autumn-winter blue Monday fragrance . I Hate to say it but it does NOT smell F*CKING FABULOUS velvet orchid is more deserving of the name and hype to me, Velvet Orchid is the best TOM FORD fragrance Ive smelled.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Nice Tom Ford creation, that seems very powerful. When you smell it you think: Wow pepper, leather lavender this must be very strong. And it smells fantastic! If I knew that this just lasts 2 hours I would never have bought it. My dad didn't know this but for 220/30ml this is just robbery. Apart from the price, nice smell bottle and typical Tom Ford name. One of the best, if not the best private blend from TF. (All TF don't smell long enough :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2118098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2118098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There is alot of love/hate about this fragrance. Yes, crazy price! But in saying that, for me, I get a smooth fougre opening with a hint of bitter almond and powdery orris. This settles to a warm leathery, wood with creamy tonka.<br />
<br />
I really enjoy wearing this for any occasion ,  though due to it's price tag, I'm lucky to own other great fragrances because I couldn't just wear this all the time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; People have reviewed the fakes on YT and they nailed it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2098451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2098451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098447" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098447" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TWN2RBO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946489"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1946489.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TWN2RBO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Amber-Absolute-1821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Absolute"title="Amber Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098447ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098447" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946489">TWN2RBO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have 8 private blends, this is the most recent addition. I couldnt pass up on the deal I got. This is a gorgeous, soft creamy almond leather type scent. Reminds me of something new, ultra luxury and plush. The slight touch of lavender really makes this a unique and original composition, the fact there are a ton of dupes speaks volumes. I get pretty good performance on my skin, 6-8 hrs. Its a scent that really comes back out to play when your skin warms up though. This is sexy, clean, leather, almond, powder, but more in the sense of if smell has a texture, I dont get a baby powder smell. This smells unique and expensive. Beware of fakes. Buy a decant or sample first, get familiar with it. Would I pay full retail for it? No. Can you find it for $200? Yes. Worth that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2098447"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2098447#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092369" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2092369" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DawnBreaker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1267449"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1267449.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DawnBreaker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Jubilation-40-Man-87958.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87958.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jubilation 40 Man"title="Jubilation 40 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2092369ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2092369" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1267449">DawnBreaker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-14">03/14/24 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is actually pretty good. The main notes I get are clary sage, bitter almond, orris, and leather. This is masculine leaning to my nose. I find it refreshing and clean. It makes me feel confident and put together. I can understand the association with baby wipes or baby powder when smelling from the nozzle, but this dries down on the skin to something different and classy. Definitely not worth the asking price, and I hate the name, but overall a pretty decent release from Tom Ford.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2092369"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2092369#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092268" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2092268" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MellieW"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1977843"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1977843.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MellieW" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Absolute-Aphrodisiac-30989.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30989.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absolute Aphrodisiac"title="Absolute Aphrodisiac"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2092268ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2092268" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1977843">MellieW</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-14">03/14/24 07:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first experience with Tom Ford, and it's a good one. Unisex but dries slightly masculine. Initial spray is strong, dry lavender and sage. After a bit the leather and vanilla come out. Usually leather scents turn sour on me but this one works; which is good because it sticks around for a long time and blends in with the base notes. I like this on me, I love it on my husband. Lasts all through my work day but doesn't wear well after the gym so won't be wearing it during the summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2092268"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2092268#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091660" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079180" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blazing Lazers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1941035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blazing Lazers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clive-Christian/Blonde-Amber-73595.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73595.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blonde Amber"title="Blonde Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079180ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079180" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941035">Blazing Lazers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-01">03/01/24 13:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can't stand how this smells on me, on others, clothes, air etc. However, it seemed to please women the couple times I wore it. I'd be nauseous if a woman wore this on a date. True definition of a personally polarizing fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2079180"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2079180#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2072992" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2072992" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dweezy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dweezy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2072992ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2072992" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261118">Dweezy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 15:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To be honest I don't know how I feel about this one. I spray it and what I get most of is the bitter almond with vanilla and a slight hint of floralness from the lavender. It's not my typical scent I'd reach for but I keep finding myself smelling my hand. So I would say its an intriguing scent but can't really see a specific occasion to wear. Don't blind buy. Test it out on skin before you buy a full bottle. I would definitely say it is unisex. I can see either a man or women wearing this casually.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2072992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2072992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2072777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2072777" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="toffeeandcream"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976479"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1976479.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="toffeeandcream" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Akro/Bake-81614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bake"title="Bake"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2072777ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2072777" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976479">toffeeandcream</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased the Oil Perfumery impression of this scent. It was a total blind buy, so I had no idea what to expect except for the fact that according to reviews, it smells virtually identical to the original Tom Ford recipe. <br />
<br />
And wow. This is one of those scents that feels exactly like what I imagined big-girl perfume to smell like as a little girl. Its fun. Sophisticated. Unique. The lavender is strong but not overbearing and pairs beautifully woodier, sweeter base notes. <br />
<br />
I admit that its not for everyone. The scent is polarizingyou either love it or you dont. In my case, I think I may have found a new favorite scent for my daily rotation. Its a little strong, so a little goes a long way. Maybe pass on this one if youre predisposed to perfume-induced headaches. <br />
<br />
All in all, definitely one of my new favorites! Recommend to anyone who likes lavender-heavy scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2072777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2072777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071516" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103">Scent.guide</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 09:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its such a pretty scent!!<br />
I wish it wasnt that expensive :( <br />
It starts with a fresh (almost minty) aromatic accord and develops into slightly sweet green almonds. After a while it becomes sweeter. Its quite radiant. I can feel a touch of plastic-y (maybe even latex) note, but it doesnt bother me much.<br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2071516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2071516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Amazing, such a noble parfume. I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2064300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2064300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2063308" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colombej"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996386"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="colombej" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2063308ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2063308" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996386">colombej</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-15">02/15/24 12:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is easily in my top 10 all time. I believe it doesn't deserve the hate it gets (although I understand the price is ridiculous as is the case with most TF), and is certainly one of the most unique scents I have ever smelled. This fragrance took time to grow on me, but now, I absolutely love it. A staple in my winter collection and wouldn't have it any other way. Herbaceous, bitter almond, and makes my nose go numb it smells so strong. Would recommend to anyone to try, but I understand it's polarizing and the things I love about it, not everyone will care for or may downright hate. But I truly believe it's a scent that you have to mature with and let it grow on you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2063308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2063308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057909" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dumbplings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dumbplings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); Also a dry hay like tobacco / vetiver / palo santo smell to it.... Strangely enough it's also musky, powdery, medicinal, peppery, leathery. It's quite a strange fragrance<br />
<br />
But I think has some similarities with Nuit d'issey by issey miyake &amp; Initio musk therapy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2057909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2057909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2055207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jhamezjingberries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917559"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1917559.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jhamezjingberries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Antonio-Puig/Quorum-3825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Quorum"title="Quorum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2055207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2055207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917559">Jhamezjingberries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-07">02/07/24 13:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lavender<br />
<br />
Clary Sage<br />
Middle Notes<br />
<br />
Leather<br />
<br />
Bitter Almond<br />
<br />
Vanilla<br />
<br />
Orris<br />
Base Notes<br />
<br />
Leather<br />
<br />
Tonka Bean<br />
<br />
Cashmeran<br />
<br />
White Woods</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2055207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2055207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2045602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2045602" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lolllee2nd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/405109"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.405109.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lolllee2nd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Fire-At-Will-70289.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70289.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fire At Will"title="Fire At Will"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2045602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2045602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/405109">lolllee2nd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 07:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TF FF starts out as a really compelling scent on me. The first 30 minutes is something I can't quite describe, it's complicated and sexy and pheromone-al in that it was a scent I felt and reacted to on a physical level that I couldn't distinguish any notes. It's like a skin scent in that it smelled like me but 10000 times better. It was heady and light but rich all at once. Aromatic is a good first decripter and leather is second for me but that second note obliterates everything else and takes over.<br />
<br />
Then, the leather note came out, and it grew and grew and grew. I'm learning I really don't like leather notes. It's a lighter, creamier leather than other leathers but I still didn't care for it. It made me nauseous.<br />
<br />
If you like leather scents, this is a truly awesome scent you might love. Try a sample first and wear it for a while. It changed so completely on me after 30 minutes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2045602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2045602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2044819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I appreciate it, but it's not my scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2038325"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2038325#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037104" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scratch &amp; Sniff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1878218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scratch &amp; Sniff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878218">Scratch &amp; Sniff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-20">01/20/24 23:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this years ago for the name.  Lets be honest with each other: we all did.<br />
<br />
In my 20s, I assumed that Tom Ford could do no wrong and that this fragrance would be equally as edgy as its namesake.  I was mistaken on both accounts.  Truth be told, the scent isnt that great and it sure as f--- doesnt live up to the name.<br />
<br />
Its primarily a leather scent, but not in a bad-boy-in-a-leather-jacket kind of way.  The vanilla and the overpowering almond note tag team this fragrance to emasculate it into something that's cloyingly sweet.  It subdues the scent to become, instead, a soft-boy-in-a-suede-jacket.<br />
<br />
In five words or less: Great f---ing marketing, limp execution.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2037104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2037104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034368" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2034368" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JangJun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/600792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.600792.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JangJun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Greenley-62101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Greenley"title="Greenley"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2034368ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2034368" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/600792">JangJun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 02:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Today, my vial package come. After Initial spay and I wonder why people rate it so high. Light sofa leather smell with some intoxicating scent. Not worth for a price and my expectation. You can always pick Ombre Leather parfum if you want better, bolder or thicker scent. Imo, after tried almost all TF perfume: Costa Azzura, Ombre Leather, Bois Marocain, Bitter Peach, Rose Prick, Noir. Final, Im in love with Oud Wood and Ebene fume. They are the best from TF house. So buy blind buy 2 and forget other because I tried for you.<br />
- update: Bleu Noir parfum got a same dry down scent like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2034368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2034368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029176" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2029176" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775729"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1775729.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pernoire/Otimo-97099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Otimo"title="Otimo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2029176ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2029176" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775729">Noir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A good, sweet leather fragrance from TF. It is very powdery and gives off the sense that it is clean leather that has been soaked in almonds, vanilla, lavender, and orris.  I found it a bit too cloying, but for its creativity, I reckon this is one of the best from the house. Performance is alright. It took me a bit of time to like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2029176"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2029176#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2025165" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sodsai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sodsai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2025165ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2025165" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947507">sodsai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>tested this on strip and skin in Neiman Marcus and it was my favorite out of all the Tom Ford selection. Smells like a leather jacket dipped in fruit candy and vanilla in the best way possible. I could see why some would be off put by it because of the creamy scent and the price. Do wish it was cheaper</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2025165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2025165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
