padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 22:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I finally got around to trying this today, and was sooooo pleasantly surprised. So glad I tried this!! I get doll's head + a slight touch of masculinity-- but I think most women who are into fragrances can pull this off easily. Definitely one of TF's highest quality fragrances. Like a smooth almond &amp; lavender dream. Can totally see this being my fragrance for just relaxing; it's not a fragrance for when you want to be 'girly'. Definitely lives up to its name haha. Absolutely FB worthy for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2025023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2025023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023747" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dopasmell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1825349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dopasmell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023747ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023747" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1825349">dopasmell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 15:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely love this, but if you want a slightly brighter smelling scent and don't care strongly for the earthy almond and orris notes, get Mancera Fig Extasy, much cheaper and gets you a similar vibe for a fraction of the cost. Fig Extasy is beautiful in its own right, and a much better value with very high quality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2023747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2023747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023241" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023241" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheElf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962617.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheElf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Falcon-Leather-59057.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59057.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Falcon Leather"title="Falcon Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962617">TheElf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 04:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite the lurid, and ludicrously overblown claim which comes with the name, this is good. Albeit a tad generic for players in the higher end luxe arena.<br />
I wear it as an everyday scent. Sans great expectations. <br />
Will I repurchase? <br />
Maybe. <br />
Will I wear and enjoy it for what it is? <br />
Certainly.<br />
Edit:<br />
This is by some leaps and bounds more interesting than most of the TF Private Blends. <br />
Perhaps its my imagination, but, the longer I have the bottle, the better the projection and staying power. Odd. Im liking it more as time passes. <br />
Its not beast-mode as some would prefer, but it has really good longevity and a dynamic unchangeability in that, what you get when you first spray, is pretty much how it remains. Which is good as it is a mellow, leathery, powdery &amp; rounded musk from the onset.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2023241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2023241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2021251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020588" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Serpentarius"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1301234.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Serpentarius" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020588ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020588" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301234">Serpentarius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the few 'likes' from my Neiman's adventure today. I had kind of a roller coaster experience with this one, but mildly, like those old wooden roller coasters that don't go upside down or anything.<br />
<br />
I liked the opening and though pepper isn't a note, I got that kind of 'fresh spicy' vibe that I like. Almost a sparkle/fizz quality, can't put my finger on it. <br />
<br />
Thought the mid was meh, sort of elusive. But this dry down?? Love it!! It's 6 hours later and though it's faint, that's what I want to smell like. <br />
<br />
It's a like for me, not a love. Not FB worthy so maybe a 10 ml at some point. May try a dupe but this is one where I feel the OG's blend and ingredients are what do it for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2020588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2020588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The smell is very unique and well made.<br />
<br />
Scent:8<br />
Projection/Longevity:7<br />
Uniqueness:10<br />
quality:9<br />
Value for money:way overpriced <br />
<br />
Overall:8.5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2020406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2020406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020151" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I couldn't bring myself to sniff this off my wrist. It smells like lavender scented burnt plastic and soap. I must admit on the testing paper it left me with my jaw dropped. Smelled like Jesus himself, clean, sexy, fresh, a bit floral. Too bad it smells like burnt garbage on my skin. Definitely not blind buy safe</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2020151"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2020151#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017067" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jam09"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995437"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jam09" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995437">jam09</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 12:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I rarely write reviews, but this fragrance deserves one. I will say upfront that I absolutely loathe this scent, but it's also fascinating! I couldn't stop smelling my wrists while I was wearing it even though I knew it wasn't for me. It smells *exactly* like someone set plastic on fire in my grandparent's old retirement home. Disgusting, but weirdly captivating too. I can see why people are so taken with it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2017067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2017067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PrincipeFilip"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PrincipeFilip" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565310">PrincipeFilip</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-30">12/30/23 06:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not understand why this fragrance has that many haters. Maybe because of its name. I do understand this is a very expensive fragrance by tom ford but actually it is quite unique and interesting, if money is no point this can be a no brainer for younger crowd. Very versatile, extremly long lasting and great performer. And still gets low scores for performance on this site which i do not understand. This easily last up to 10 hours and project fantastic for couple or hours, you dont need more than 4-5 sprays</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2015042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2015042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012949" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535209">dan99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 05:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with the comments below that this is a statement piece as it is very unique. There is this herbaceous note that gives it a salty feeling. I think it is coming from the clary sage but its beautifully contrasted with this fresh aromatics that some associate with baby wipes. To me it smells fresh and clean that is mixed in with some dirtiness. It is very good, but I can definitely see that it may not be for everyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2012949"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2012949#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012148" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="broccoli24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1944234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="broccoli24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012148ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012148" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); In fact, it grew on me a lot over time. However, I think at its price point, there are a lot of other fragrances that I would consider buying a full bottle for. I understand the appeal, truly. But, I think the marketing surrounding this fragrance and its uniqueness are the main reasons people really talk about this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2003593" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="signalfire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/624117"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.624117.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="signalfire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2003593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2003593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/624117">signalfire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-17">12/17/23 10:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What *IS* that? Did you take Tom Cruise's 'Maverick' leather jacket from Top Gun and soak it in pickle juice? I get spoiled leather, a weird maybe lavender background and loads of sage. No vanilla. Next time, just leather, please. <br />
<br />
With a name like that, best do a roaring fireplace in a log cabin, far in the northern pine wilderness, Christmas Eve and you just *know* that you're going to get what you really, really wanted for Christmas. And YOU get to unwrap him.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2003593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2003593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001639" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jckayyyyyyy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jckayyyyyyy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Fiero-11802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fiero"title="Fiero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001639ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001639" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862909">Jckayyyyyyy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-14">12/14/23 23:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like piney hospital cleaner on me. Tried wearing 3 times and gave my tester away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="2001639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=2001639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999324" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pwaladdi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780580"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1780580.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pwaladdi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780580">Pwaladdi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This I might say has gotten me compliments, its not my favorite scent, however I prefer layering it with a sweeter fragrance. The longevity and projection is incredible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1999324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1999324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995822" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995822" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LotsofLisa76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1699812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1699812.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LotsofLisa76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-est-Belle-L-Extrait-84073.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84073.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie est Belle L&#039;Extrait"title="La Vie est Belle L&#039;Extrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995822ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995822" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1699812">LotsofLisa76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 07:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a bit overwhelming for me. As ridiculous as it sounds, it was like I doused myself in diesel fuel. but I happily gave it to my husband who loves and wears it. Every now and then IK give it a spritz to layer on top of in the cold months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1995822"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1995822#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995796" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yalcin05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408251"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408251.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yalcin05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-Parfum-89988.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89988.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood Parfum"title="Oud Wood Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408251">Yalcin05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 06:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"the name" promises a lot, its a new trend i guess the names since a couple of years, altough tom ford has a brilliant marketing, since it always works and reaches his goal: SEDUCTIVE, sexy, mysterious... it doesnt mean its an amazing scent, but its TF who aims for that vibe, which they nailed again with this perfume.<br />
<br />
It opens with a very strong dose of pure lavender oil, beneath directly that rough leather vanilla and almond. Beautiful opening, and yes some of the people about baby wipes, i get it, but its not... After the opening it continues the lavender keeps there but the clary sage dissapears finally, which is the least ingredient i like in this composition. Now the almond, vanilla base with that rough leather is really clear and starts to project very good! <br />
<br />
During the day it softens and the leather is very smooth now, like its silky. The almond and vanilla are still there but more relaxed, and suddenly the smell of a iris pops out... its indeed fabolous in the air, where you can pick them up, the base, the mid and even still the lavender... <br />
<br />
End of the day: soft vanilla with some iris touches... but still famliar profile to the opening. So what i think about this scent.. like i said TF nailed the name for sure, but because of that it comes with a ridicilous price.. the blend is good, clever and quality, but there is no single expensive material used in here, like pure oils, or stronger concentration of a vanilla or orris. It could have been something from the signature line (pricewise). But yeah its TF they are all overpriced in this private blend right...?<br />
<br />
i give it a 8/10 because of the price, but smell and performance are great! would i pay retail? No... i got it for the half at least. But is it worth it? Yes it is... just try to find at discounters. No idea about batches  and reformulations, but i have a 2017 batch.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1995796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1995796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1992345" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DarthFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1639884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DarthFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Superleggera-95753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"title="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1992345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1992345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639884">DarthFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-04">12/04/23 13:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm using up the rest of my decant today of FF. I love this fragrance, it smells so good while being unique, it really smells nothing like anything I own. Out of my entire collection, if I had to compare it to anything, I'd compare it to Pegasus and the 2 are not even close. FF is sweet, spicy, leathery, creamy and woody. They are all notes I've smelled so many times before, but blended in a way that makes it smell so unique and irresistible. Longevity is good and projection is moderate.<br />
<br />
I recently bought the Maison Alhambra clone of FF called Fabulo Intense, and I'm wearing that on my right hand and FF on my left hand. They smell slightly different during the first 10 minutes with FF being slightly warmer and smoother, but then they end up in the same place. The clone is noticeably stronger in both longevity and projection than FF, and I think the strength is partially responsible for the difference in scent during the opening. Whatever cloning technology they're using these days seems to be really good, because now that I own Fabulo Intense, I don't feel the need to get FF because they are so close and the clone has added performance. I asked someone else to smell and compare both scents on my skin, and they thought I was playing a trick on them and that it was the same scent on both hands.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1992345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1992345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989856" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="greg.3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1508625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="greg.3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1508625">greg.3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-01">12/01/23 10:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My local Cosmetic Co Store started carrying the small Tom Ford 2ml retail samples, and they had FF along with several other scents.   6 for $15, limit 2 of each scent per person.    I bought two Rose Prick, two Myrrh Mystere, and two F-ing Fabulous.    Spray FF on my left arm and MM on my right arm.   After two hours, the FF has faded to a faint skin scent, while the MM is still powering along at least 40-50% as strong as it was after the first 15 minutes.   <br />
<br />
Overall, the FF is pleasant, but not altogether complex and definitely "Fabulous" in any sense.   I'd call it "Overwhelmingly Average". <br />
<br />
The dry down after two hours smells like it has some incense/labdanum in it, even though that's not listed in the notes.  I pick up a -very- light leather and amber, with a touch of wood but can't tell what kind. <br />
<br />
The Myrrh Mystere is definitely more interesting, I'll write a separate review of that one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1989856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1989856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987805" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gandrasta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/15995"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.15995.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gandrasta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/M7-1031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="M7"title="M7"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987805ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987805" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/15995">gandrasta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-28">11/28/23 22:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok I smell the experimental side of this perfume. Reminds me so much to Ganymede but with leather instead of metallic rust. It's piercing aromatic with a lot of dusty leather backbone. Quirky, long lasting yet versatile. It's indeed fucking fabulous!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1987805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1987805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1984082" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AUyliong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1859277.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AUyliong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1984082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1984082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859277">AUyliong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-24">11/24/23 08:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initial notes smell like the taste of cherry-flavored hard candy. It's sweet and saccharine. <br />
<br />
5 minutes later, it has transformed into raspberry flavored candy. I'm getting some tartness but it is still very very sweet. Like a candy. Lavender is deep in the background. I get some licorice every now and then but this is a supporting actor to the hard candy. All that said, the opening is very unisex. It doesn't skew to one sex or the other. <br />
<br />
Strong projection. Bold and concentrated. <br />
<br />
45 mins: Not much change other than the scent has subdued a little. There is a scented lipgloss quality to the scent now which makes it skew feminine. Otherwise, it's pretty linear. <br />
<br />
55 mins: scent has subsided even more. I'm detecting a little bit of powderiness coming through. It's not overwhelming like in Guerlain's Black Perfecto but it's helping give the dying embers of the cherry note some lift for that final push as it crosses the 1 hr mark. <br />
<br />
1 hr 30 mins: There's still some hard candy sweetness left but vanilla has now taken center stage. Orris is deep in the background.<br />
<br />
1 hr 40 mins: Vanilla is gone replaced by a beautifully blended perfume-y flower - clary sage? It smells like expensive women's perfume. <br />
<br />
2 hrs 40 mins: There's been no change since the 1 hr 40 min mark other than gradual diminishing of intensity. It's much softer now. I never really got any leather or cashmeran - at least not in how I recognize them from Tom Ford. They're probably very well blended into the composition and act more as bit players rather than stars of the show. <br />
<br />
3 hrs: Tonka bean with a subtle hint of amber very lightly scented with lavender. We're officially down to the base notes. Amazingly, it's still projecting - at least arm's length.<br />
<br />
5 hrs: Still going strong but no change.<br />
<br />
5.5 hrs: Intensity has fallen off a cliff from just 30 mins ago. It's very very faint now and hard to detect. I actually thought it was gone for a second there.<br />
<br />
7 hrs: Still there. Skin scent but undeniably still there.<br />
<br />
9 hrs in: Still not gone. Longevity of this on clothes must be beastly.<br />
<br />
Finally completely gone after about 13 hrs. Not sure if it's just my skin chem that made it go eternal. Most others don't seem to have the same result.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1984082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1984082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982399" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1982399" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JosephFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1689650.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JosephFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1982399ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1982399" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689650">JosephFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-22">11/22/23 00:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unapologetically Bold and Seductive<br />
<br />
I recently added Tom Ford's "Fucking Fabulous" to my fragrance collection, and I must say, it lives up to its audacious name. This scent is a masterpiece that exudes confidence and sophistication.<br />
<br />
The opening notes hit you with a captivating blend of lavender and bitter almond, creating an intriguing and bold introduction. As the fragrance evolves, the heart notes of orris root add a touch of elegance and depth, seamlessly transitioning into the intoxicating allure of leather. The dry down is where "Fucking Fabulous" truly shines, with the warmth of tonka bean leaving a lingering, sensual trail that lasts for hours.<br />
<br />
What I appreciate most about this fragrance is its uniqueness. It's not your typical, run-of-the-mill scent; it's a statement. The juxtaposition of the floral and nutty elements with the rich, leathery undertones creates a composition that is both daring and refined.<br />
<br />
Performance-wise, it's outstanding. The longevity is impressive, and the sillage is just rightenough to leave a memorable impression without overwhelming the senses. I find it suitable for various occasions, from a night out on the town to a special event where you want to make a lasting impact.<br />
<br />
The sleek, black bottle with gold accents is a visual representation of the luxuriousness within. While the price point may be higher, the quality and craftsmanship are undoubtedly worth it.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, if you're searching for a fragrance that breaks free from convention and elevates your presence with an unapologetically bold and seductive aura, "Fucking Fabulous" by Tom Ford is, without a doubt, a worthy investment. It's a fragrance for those who appreciate the artistry of perfumery and want to leave an unforgettable impression wherever they go.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1982399"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1982399#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972419" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="carrico1986"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153909.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="carrico1986" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153909">carrico1986</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-09">11/09/23 06:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Holy smokes! First spray smells like really strong vicks vapour rub even though there is no eucalyptus in this. Thankfully it dries down quickly to a pleasant, smooth lavender/clary sage/cashmere skin scent. I'm not picking up any other notes though, other than those 3. I spritzed myself 3 times and it already seems to be fading away. Pleasant aroma but no longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1972419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1972419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972418" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1971606" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jadore87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868284"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jadore87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1971606ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1971606" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868284">Jadore87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-08">11/08/23 05:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought this with high expectations. If you name a fragrance F*king Fabulous its only normal to anticipate something completely unique and soul transforming. Im so mad because you could spray mosquito repellent on my other arm and i would completely absolutely believe that it was FF by TF. Its so ridiculous the audacity they had to name this perfume FF when it smells putrid. The dry down is horrendous and not even in a cool niche, if you get it you get it kind of way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1971606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1971606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1970398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1970398" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amanita Phalloides"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1772608"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Amanita Phalloides" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1970398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1970398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1772608">Amanita Phalloides</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-06">11/06/23 18:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"F*cking Migraine" would be more accurate. <br />
<br />
I can't give a full review of this as I find it physically impossible to wear. Within 10 minutes of spraying it on I was in the shower scrubbing it off my skin and my clothes were in the wash. A dose of Zofran would not be remiss here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1970398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1970398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1969710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Experimental, avant garde, snobbish fragrance. But i like it.<br />
Powdery, leather, floral profile with a what the fukk factor. <br />
I love the ingenuity of Tom Ford fragrances. <br />
<br />
Uncensored adult rebellious fragrance. Just as the name suggests</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1965855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1965855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1965450" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Initial spray may be too floral and sweet for some, might also stay a little cloying throughout the day.<br />
Interesting and unique; progresses very nicely from sweet spray to a more masculine leathery/amber dry down.<br />
Great performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1965450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1965450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I have a sample and I absolutely love this fragrance! The opening of sage and lavender it's very interesting, making diferent of the boring citrus opening that has on other fragances, and the dry down that makes me love this fragrance, the mix of almond, vanille and leather, with a little bit of powdery, makes something wonderful and masculine. The performance is very good.<br />

Its very unique and I totally understand why people might not like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1955060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1955060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
