This smells like an old uncle just came back from a long office work who rides an old car while smoking a cigar.. Luckily i bought a decant of this by accident. It smells like a baby soap really strong lavender, sage &amp; tonka bean. I dont really get the leather notes in this and after sniffing too hard it kind of burnt my inner nose a little bit. <br />
<br />
This is a totally the type of perfume that u wear it for yourself as u not going to get compliments. <br />
<br />
Overall rating 5/10 <br />
Blind buy? Not at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1954705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1954705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946408" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="C.P.71"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220292"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="C.P.71" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946408ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946408" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220292">C.P.71</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 11:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Anyone else getting D&amp;G By vibes?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1946408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1946408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945089" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pentagon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848201"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pentagon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848201">Pentagon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-05">10/05/23 18:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong sage opening that dries down to baby wipes.  I do not smell the vanilla, bitter almond, tonka, and amber -- in fact, if you go by the notes, your mind would conjure up a delicious fragrance.  I personally find the sage and lavender opening off-putting, and I only stuck it out because I bought a bottle and was trying to make it work.  I suppose when the fragrance dries down to the powdery note, it's more tolerable.  But for this price, it indeed should be f***ing fabulous!  This is just a luxury brand coming out with a brilliantly marketed concept because, with such an audacious name, you believe that it must be good.  Unfortunately, it's not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1945089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1945089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945069" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caracalla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1055440"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1055440.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caracalla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Oud-Noir-17338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Oud Noir"title="Versace Pour Homme Oud Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1055440">caracalla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-05">10/05/23 18:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find the opening a tad unpleasant, but it dries down to a nice scent. I've made the mistake of spraying this both on my clothes and my skin, and on the clothes this harsh unpleasantness seems to last forever. But where I've sprayed on the skin it's quite pleasant, full bodied yet soft.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1945069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1945069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1944123" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1944123" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Intense-78740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Intense"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1944123ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1944123" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-04">10/04/23 12:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#259 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
I think we can all agree that Tom Ford scents are really excellent for the most part, and really pricey on the whole, which is why so many really good dupes are out there for much of the line. At $279 for the 50 mil bottle this stuff is very pricey for what you get. Saks actually wants $595 for 50 mil. The pricing would be insane for this admittedly very nice scent if we had a dozen strong competitors offering identical DNA. Sadly, we do not, and Tom Ford knows it hence the pricing. Everyone goes for the Fabulo Intense by Maison Alhambra but it absolutely does not replicate the floral notes of this fragrance, so I don't see it as an adequate replacement. I haven't tried the Alexandria Fragrances dupe, but the 50/50 up and down votes on that similarity tells you they haven't come up with a decent clone either. And whoever was reminded of Al Hamarain Amber Oud Black Edition, get your sinuses checked. You've got a condition. <br />
<br />
The closest dupe I've found is Miris 33296, a dupe being sold on Amazon for $23.34. It's a Ukrainian lab and I've tried a dozen of their dupes so far and they are close enough on most of their efforts I've sampled. Still, this Tom Ford scent is apparently more complex than the TF haters will want to admit. But let's be honest about the hostility here. If Tom Ford Scents were priced under $99 would there be any haters? You know there wouldn't be. We'd all love to wear this stuff every day, but if it's this or health insurance. Certainly, this is a great scent. I love some lavender and iris in my fragrances, and I've shelled out over $250 a bottle to get them in the past, but not something I would do to have more than one such fragrance on the shelf. I have Amouage Reflection and Interlude Black Iris already, so for that category I think I'm well covered. <br />
<br />
This is a fair projector for an hour, long-lasting on the skin. I don't see this as unisex at all, which the lack of female reviewers has already confirmed. I'd go easy in close spaces like a car-pool, elevator. I just got a lecture from one of my tres L.A. girlfriends about men wearing strongly projecting fragrances and how most women find it off-putting. I have always avoided smelling like a New York cab driver for that reason, though some of those guys and the long hours they pull, hygiene becomes an issue only Brut or Old Spice can handle. I'd just say go easy with this until you have a sense of how it performs, and don't bother spraying your clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1944123"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1944123#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1941596" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1941596" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ahmet Reis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1738538.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ahmet Reis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Onekh-41220.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41220.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Onekh"title="Onekh"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1941596ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1941596" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738538">Ahmet Reis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-01">10/01/23 04:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hell No, Its not similar @Dior Sausage</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1938298" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="op81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1849250"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="op81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1938298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1938298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1849250">op81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-27">09/27/23 01:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i'd say this is my signature fragrance. it is beautiful and brings such a deep smell. It's warm, it's spicy and It's good for a winter or fall fragrance. the leather is so strong so if you like smelling like some dark and cynical yet sexy mafia boss I'd heavily suggest buying this. One thing I'm upset about with this fragrance is that it does not project as much as I wish it did. When people lean in and smell, they'd compliment but I thought this would project across the hallway or something. It lasts a long time, but spray the right places if you worry about long lasting</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1938298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1938298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1938048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820824">BLIENTELE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-16">09/16/23 10:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love it or hate it This Smells like  Baby wipes fabulous baby wipes  </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1929413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1929413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1928331" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1928331" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ahmet Reis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1738538.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ahmet Reis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Onekh-41220.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41220.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Onekh"title="Onekh"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1928331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1928331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); Tell me which perfume is similar to this? Give me an example?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1928331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1928331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1928318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1928318" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ali_minaj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676985"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676985.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="ali_minaj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1928318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1928318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676985">ali_minaj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-15">09/15/23 01:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>FAAAAAABULOUSSSSSSSSSSSS~</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1928318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1928318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1926497" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scissorslizardspock"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1026213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1026213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scissorslizardspock" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-L-Eau-38543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 L&#039;Eau"title="Chanel No 5 L&#039;Eau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1926497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1926497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1026213">Scissorslizardspock</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-12">09/12/23 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not at all what expected with such barbershop and herbal notes, but this is a tonka bean lavender fragrance with suede touches and a soft vanilla background.  Its not gourmand, but its not floral or entirely herbal either. <br />
<br />
Im not sure about the reviews calling this common or basic. Ive yet to smell such a smooth and full-bodied lavender.  The well-blended almond-tonka mix is just seamless.  <br />
<br />
Perhaps since Im a woman, I havent smelled enough lavender dominant scents, but Im very familiar with the current lavender trend in womens fragrances, and none are like this.  Im a girly-girl and feel perfectly feminine in this, but can also see it on a man, its totally genderless.  Its a relaxing sort of scent that helps to calm the senses.  I really like this, Im so glad I have it.<br />
<br />
Update November 23:  my husband has stolen my bottle.  And since he smells amazing, I cant complain even a little bit.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1926497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1926497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1924892" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skalathraxx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506787"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="skalathraxx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1924892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1924892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506787">skalathraxx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-10">09/10/23 21:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is overhyped honestly.<br />
<br />
First spray is kinda cool.<br />
Very rich, leather, almond, tonka, fresh lavender.<br />
<br />
After couple of hours I have only almond and powdery. Smells like Sephora cosmetics to my nose. <br />
Nothing horrible, but Ill be mad to pay full price for such basic sent at very premium price.<br />
Next.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1924892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1924892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; After the dry down it's alight but the top I don't get any lavender, I would recommend you try it but it's not for everyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1921536"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1921536#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918746" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Watchthethrone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775129"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1775129.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Watchthethrone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775129">Watchthethrone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-03">09/03/23 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overhated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1918746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1918746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918741" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918741" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentrist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.8051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentrist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness"title="Oud for Greatness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918741ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918741" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8051">Scentrist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-03">09/03/23 10:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got done reading one of these mundane "Top-## Leather fragrance" articles and among them a host of very 'non-leather' scents were mentioned, plus this among them. Ok, I can see where someone might want to drop this in even tough it's much more antithetical to a more purist leather scent (and I can think of many leather fragrances that are much more faithful to that note without taking anything away from TFPB Fucking Fabulous. I like FF. It's interesting. But more than anything, it permeates with almond and vanilla, and Tuscan Leather would have been a better choice for the category. All that aside, this never reaches beyond that vanillin/almond/powdery air for me, and tends to occupy this ethereal space where it projects well and stays above the skin but doesn't really infuse enough to my skin chemistry to share the space. I like it on occasion on a warm evening when I can wear it and make a different statement than usual. I've had it some years now and I won't say I feel a true sense of enjoyment about wearing it, and returning to it for another try doesn't engender it further to me enough to say I love it or it's just really f'ing fabulous. It's there not as a highlight, not as a favorite, but as that conversation piece of art on the wall that says nearly nothing about the wearer and leaves most confused to its statement.<br />
<br />
But to my mind and nose, this isn't leather but rather an overpriced and pretentious latte where the barista greets me with a tip jar and a tablet clamoring for me to "extend my spend" for the privilege of stopping by. I'll still be looking for my comfy loafers and leather jacket.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1918741"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1918741#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917501" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1917501" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="auntwebbie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702618"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="auntwebbie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6458.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bal d&#039;Afrique"title="Bal d&#039;Afrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1917501ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1917501" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702618">auntwebbie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-01">09/01/23 21:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I feel so perplexed by this one. I get an almond-floral thing, sure, but my nose cant dive any deeper than that into the floral because I am derailed by a synthetic rubber or plastic note that gives me a touch of nausea. Im a little new to the Tom Ford collection, and I love Black Orchid, Bitter Peach, and Rose Prick (powdery grandmother smell? heck no!). But this one and I are not a fated pair. Better for my pocketbook.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1917501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1917501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46513" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent863330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc863330" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xanovia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.208914.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xanovia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/FZOTIC/Lampblack-18858.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18858.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lampblack"title="Lampblack"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma863330ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd863330" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208914">Xanovia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-21">09/21/17 16:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok lets be honest, the name is stupid. That's out of the way so lets move on to that the fragrance is not aptly named. This fragrance really isn't 'fabulous' at all. I am working on a 5ml decant and it personally I think it should have been called 'Fucking Meh'. It's nice but it's nothing ground breaking and not close to anything special especially compared to the rest from this line. It is a basic fragrance of sweet tonka leather that they artificially created hype around with an over the top name and limited availability and hence exclusivity. I worried that I would love this and never be able to get it again and thankfully that is not the case at all. <br />
<br />
05/10 - Basic middle of the road fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="863330"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=863330#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1298290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1298290" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deswizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1274132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deswizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Amber-79699.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79699.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Amber"title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1298290ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1298290" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274132">Deswizard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-24">02/24/21 23:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't like delving into note play, I like reporting what I notice. Also, reviewers on here who are constantly comparing perfumes to diapers probably need to see an ENT specialist.<br />
<br />
Tom Ford's Fucking Fabulous is certainly fabulous. The composition is very smooth and pleasing. This is definitely a perfume you wear for yourself, not for other people. You may get a few compliments, but I don't feel that's the point here.<br />
<br />
This will please you. It will surround you in a slightly flowery, slightly sweet-from-the-vanilla and leathery cocoon that will have you taking in deep breaths all day. Despite that, this perfume definitely leans more towards masculine. <br />
<br />
The performance is great. Longevity is 8+ hours without being cloying. The projection is moderate as well as the sillage. Anything that comes into contact with your spray points will carry a faint Fucking Fabulous scent, so scarf lovers, this is for you.<br />
<br />
This is definitely an early morning scent as well as better in cooler temperatures. The price is on the higher side, but if you love yourself - treat yourself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1298290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1298290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent870437" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc870437" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maxpowerboston"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089734"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1089734.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maxpowerboston" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma870437ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd870437" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089734">maxpowerboston</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-13">10/13/17 10:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Powdery fishing lures. That's what this smells like, almost exactly. If you've spent any time on a lake/stream/ocean fishing you know exactly what a rubber fishing lure smells like. Kind of sweet, kind of rubbery. Iris/tonka dominant, for sure.<br />
<br />
If you like DHI, VOI, Prada l'Homme or any other masculine iris scent you'll like this, I suspect. It's very much in that genre. I like that genre a bit, so I like this one.<br />
<br />
Longevity was above average on my skin (6-8 hours) and projection was very strong for a few hours. <br />
<br />
A 7.0/10 for me. I actually think it's well-blended and does what it tries to do (a sort of seductive, clean, powdery scent). The pricing ($400 for 50 ml) makes this a novelty purchase only since the others in the genre can be had for 10-20% of the price and deliver just as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="870437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=870437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1081637" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195937">HungarianGenius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-24">07/24/19 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this absolutely pumps out bitter almond and creamy lavender for like 3 hours non stop. after that you start to notice the orris and vanilla/tonka more prominently.<br />
<br />
a heavy yet ethereal fragrance.<br />
<br />
i find it very pleasant and likable , and completely dont get the hate due to its name.<br />
<br />
Longevity and projection is borderline cruel to people around you, haha. projects really strong for around 6 hours, and lasts 12+ hours very noticeably on skin. i over sprayed first time using it not knowing what to expect and it was extreme. learned a lesson that day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1765771" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mrssugarrush"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387686"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387686.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mrssugarrush" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1765771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1765771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387686">mrssugarrush</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-21">02/21/23 14:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a guy who finished mowing his lawn and didn't have any time to shower, so he wiped the grass stains off with baby wipes and put on a ton of deodorant. <br />
Before leaving to meet with his buddies at a bar, he takes a second to admire his freshly cut lawn and whispers to himself: "Fucking fabulous".</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="1765771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=1765771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent856735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc856735" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sezyvex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/854265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.854265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sezyvex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nicolai-Parfumeur-Createur/Incense-Oud-40712.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40712.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Incense Oud"title="Incense Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma856735ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd856735" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/854265">Sezyvex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-01">09/01/17 05:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is this seriously the name of a Tom Ford fragrance? Is it going to be stocked at malls were people with their families and children will be visiting? <br />
<br />
I do not understand what has gotten into this world and how language like that is deemed to be so 'acceptable' that it would adorn a fragrance bottle and be allowed to be on display. More so that people are so casual about it and even more so such cheapness on the face of a luxury brand! I have just found another excuse to say goodbye to the horrid world of consumerism.<br />
<br />
All the rebels will vote down any comments that are normal and opposing the supposed 'shock value'. For the sake of what exactly? Unfuckingbelievable!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="856735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=856735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent869529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc869529" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="harlemmal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/129912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.129912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="harlemmal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Harmonist/Yin-Transformation-Parfum-51467.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51467.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yin Transformation Parfum"title="Yin Transformation Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma869529ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd869529" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/129912">harlemmal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-10">10/10/17 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a really good Tonka scent with a mix of almond. Its not the best tonka but definitely a pleasant one. Longevity is decent and so is the silage. I wish those people who commented on their dislike or like of the name of the fragrance chose to put them in a thread in the forum instead of the review section.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="869529"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=869529#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent883997" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc883997" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kingoftheclouds"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1101807"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kingoftheclouds" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ermenegildo-Zegna/Uomo-17125.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17125.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uomo"title="Uomo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma883997ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd883997" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1101807">kingoftheclouds</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-26">11/26/17 09:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Completely overpowered by powder. Has the potential to be a delicate, pleasant scent, but the soapy and powdery notes make this expensive "masterpiece" smell like baby wipes. I cannot think of a person in my life who could rock this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="883997"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=883997#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent913258" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc913258" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="afterhoursharmony"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1107474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1107474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="afterhoursharmony" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Orris-Sandalwood-35021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orris &amp; Sandalwood"title="Orris &amp; Sandalwood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma913258ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd913258" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1107474">afterhoursharmony</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-02-18">02/18/18 22:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally got to smell this at a Harry Rosen, who wanted $400 for 50ml I may add...<br />
<br />
It was Fucking Fabulous for about ten seconds, then it turned to baby powder and gave me a massive headache.<br />
<br />
I agree with most of the people on here, it's anything but fabulous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46513"comment_id="913258"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html?ccid=913258#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46513" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">59.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Juliette-Has-A-Gun.html" class="en2inter">Juliette Has A Gun</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">60.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Roja-Dove.html" class="en2inter">Roja Dove</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
                            <div style="clear: bottom; margin-top: 1rem;"></div>

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
